sentences.sContent: a proposal whereby EU citizens would be allowed to reside anywhere in the EU
sentences.sCn: 允许欧盟公民在欧盟任何地方居住的一项提议

sentences.sContent: ...whereby good performance leads commentators to attribute all manner of virtues to anything and everything the company does...
...This is part of the process of self-validation whereby we employ self-disclosures to seek support for our self-concept...

trans.tranCn: 凭此； 借以； 由于
trans.tranOther: by means of which or according to which
